post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
JOB DESCRIPTION


Title:

Intermediate Application Developer – J2EE
Overview:

The Intermediate Application Developer – J2EE is responsible for the Design, Development, Release, and Support of software applications for both internal external clients using J2EE.

Requirements Gathering
Design, implementation and maintenance of applications from given requirements specifications
Application detailed design, coding, unit test development and conduct, integration and testing, and system performance assessment
Creation of technical documents for system design
Maintenance of existing modules and applications.
Development of new applications.
System Documentation
Application security testing.
Development of unit tests for new modules developed
Reconfigures and extends existing solutions so that new and existing solutions operate as an integrated system
Provide Production trouble-shooting analysis & resolution
Mentoring
Data Analysis and Reporting
Technical R&D

Must HAVE:

College/University Degree
Web Development
3+ Years Web application development
Understand SLDC principles
Able to capture/refine business requirements into technical specifications
Able to create test plans from provided business requirements
Ability to mentor junior staff
Experienced in J2EE Core Patterns
Experienced in various MVC frameworks - Struts and JSF preferred
Solid understanding in HTML/DHTML/CSS and JavaScript
Experienced in CSS
Exposure to Spring framework
Experienced in ORM frameworks - Hibernate and iBatis preferred
Experienced in AJAX based frameworks - DWR and Dojo preferred
Solid understanding in HTTP protocol
Experienced in XML and XSLT






Sarah Shub

Resource Manager



7965 Goreway Drive, Suite 2

Brampton , Ontario L6T 5T5

P: 905-799-4550 Ext. 325

C: 416-820-5119
